structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Action against representative of tenant -- Revivor.
law.text: An action for waste may be brought against the representatives of a tenant, or if instituted in the lifetime of a tenant may be revived against his representative after his death.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2335.
